column1: Not sure whats it about,but its on at 9:30pm Saturday nightwith repeats at 10:30am sunday morning and 2:30pm Sunday afternoon

Thanks for letting know, infomanBristol. Sadly, I won't have any chance to watch - with no access to TV plus little trust in BBC after all the rubbish they thrown into the air about Ukraine last year before Euro-2012. Perhaps you or anyone else could kindly let us know what is was about? Thank you very much.

Featuring news on issues around the world. Lucy Ash travels to Kiev to find out more as leaders of Ukraine's Orange Revolution promise to tackle the country's Aids epidemic. its on bbc iplayer possible to watch online (in UK)
Thanks, Irina! :) Thought it would be yet another rubbish; so not surprised. Do they ever feature burning and pertinent issues?
